name: The Largest Pumpkin in Nova Scotia
name_original: The Largest Pumpkin in Nova Scotia
description:
Meet Howard Dill, a man with one goal: grow the largest pumpkin in Nova Scotia (and maybe even the world!) The catch is that growing enormous pumpkins takes time and there are lots of critters that would love to eat Howard’s great gourd before it reaches award-winning size. Help Howard defend his pumpkin from waves of enemies in this top-down gardening shooter. 

                                                                  

  • Plant a garden of vegetables that grow into power boosts, weapons, and turrets to help fight back insects.
  • Watch your pumpkin grow to enormous size as the Provincial Fair nears.
  • Win the respect of farmers everywhere!

Mouse recommended!

Credits:

  • Rodrigo Okamoto: Programming, Music
  • Noah Kuhn  (@_noah_kuhn_ Soundcloud: noahnoahnoahnoahnoahnoah): Programming, Music
  • Alex Hanlin (@gluethulhu): Programming, Art
  • Eric Hayes (@_erichayes_): Writing, Art

Made in 72 hours for the UT Summer Stop n' Swap Jam
